snippet: In hiring Sherilyn S. McCoy after an extensive search, Avon appears to be making the case that it can turn around the company on its own, without help.
abstract: Avon Products hires Sherilyn S McCoy as its new chief executive, only a month after rejecting a $10 billion unsolicited takeover bid from rival Coty; company has struggled in recent years with declining sales, a bribery investigation and increasingly restless investors.
lead_paragraph: In hiring Sherilyn S. McCoy after an extensive search, Avon appears to be making the case that it can turn around the company on its own, without help.

headline.seo: Avon Names McCoy as New Chief
